definition: appropriate to the beginning or start of an event, a turn to be a starter (in a game at the beginning)
details:
adjective
- appropriate to the beginning or start of an event
= example: appropriate to the beginning or start of an event
- (especially of eyes) bulging or protruding as with fear
= example: (especially of eyes) bulging or protruding as with fear
noun
- a turn to be a starter (in a game at the beginning)
= synonyms: start
